mapper.select: select a.id aid,a.line_id,a.terminal_id,a.content,a.alert_data,a.alert_date,isconfirm,l.line_name,d.id did,d.`name` from alert a,device d,line l where a.terminal_id=d.terminal_id and a.line_id = l.line_id and isconfirm = 0 group by a.id
mapper.update: update alert set isconfirm = 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select a.alert_date days,ifnull(b.count,0) as count from ( SELECT curdate() as alert_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) as alert_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 day) as alert_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) as alert_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 4 day) as alert_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 day) as alert_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 6 day) as alert_date ) a left join ( select date(alert_date) as datetime, count(*) as count from alert group by date(alert_date) ) b on a.alert_date = b.datetime;

select a.name,ifnull(b.count,0) count from device_type a left join (select d.device_type_id, ifnull(count(a.terminal_id),0) as count from alert a, device d where a.terminal_id = d.terminal_id and a.line_id = d.line_id and TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(a.alert_date) <= #{time} group by d.device_type_id) b on a.device_type_id=b.device_type_id
select line_id from alert where isconfirm = 0 group by line_id
